item.title: By: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.dc:creator: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.description: How can we do it as a cross-tab report, e.g. for Product Names across and re-order level for each product?
item.content:encoded: How can we do it as a cross-tab report, e.g. for Product Names across and re-order level for each product?
